reuze

Class m_Matrix2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.m_Matrix2D

  • public class m_Matrix2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a 2D matrix that can be used to create transformed Vector2D objects.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

        public void identity()
